## useSortedParticipants (hook)

The useSortedParticipants hook returns the only the active speakers of all participants.

### Import

```typescript
import { useSortedParticipants } from '@livekit/components-react';
```

{% usage name="usesortedparticipants" package="@livekit/components-react" exampleCount=0 /%}

## Parameters

| Parameter    | Type                     | Description |
| ------------ | ------------------------ | ----------- |
| participants | Array&lt;Participant&gt; |             |

**Returns:**

Participant\[\]
